details.Shared Trust Components: ⚠️ No dedicated trust components in shared directory

key_features_validated: TrustIndicatorsGroup component with comprehensive props interface
Detailed guardrails validation (Safety Verification, Rate Limits)
PII protection monitoring with specific data types tracked
Circuit breaker status tracking with real-time state monitoring
Rollback capabilities with step count verification (5 steps available)
RAG source quality assessment (3 sources, 89% similarity)
trust_indicators_features: Guardrails validation with pass/fail status and detailed explanations
PII protection tracking for IP addresses, User IDs, Email addresses
Circuit breaker monitoring with open/closed/half-open states
Rollback readiness with available status and step count
RAG validation with source count and similarity metrics
Professional UI integration with existing dashboard components
